sentences.sContent: A troubled hound was baying the moon.
sentences.sContent_eng: A troubled hound was baying the moon.
sentences.sCn: 一条受惊不安的猎狗正在对月狂吠。

sentences.sContent: Our fox and hound find their long friendship thoroughly obliterated and end up trying to kill each other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our fox and hound find their long friendship thoroughly obliterated and end up trying to kill each other.
sentences.sCn: 我们的狐狸和猎狗发现他们的老交情彻底被毁了，最后居然要杀死对方。

trans.tranOther: a dog that is fast and has a good sense of smell, used for hunting
